segments.text: Why have you decided to change jobs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope to change because my current job is not within my chosen field.Since my major was international banking , I really hope to work at a bank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then , why do you want to work for our bank since it's a new establishment in Shanghai ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because your bank is a new one , I think I'll be given more opportunities , and the working conditions and surroundings are so excellent here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It certainly is . But the work is also hard here . You need to put a lot of hard hours on the job to succeed in this field .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I expect to work hard , madam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind going on frequent business traps ?
segments.speaker: S1
